description: Identify the time period with the highest number of farm tractors produced.
Determine the number of farm tractors produced from July 2015 to June 2016.
Calculate the total number of farm tractors produced from July 2014 to June 2017.
Find any time period that has significantly lower tractor production compared to others.
Identify if there is a noticeable trend in the number of tractors produced over the given periods.
Which time periods have tractor production numbers higher than 50,000?
Rank the time periods from the highest to the lowest number of farm tractors produced.
Determine the range of tractor production numbers across all time periods.
What is the percentage of time periods with tractor production numbers higher than 40,000?
Identify clusters of time periods with similar tractor production numbers.
